message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper deals with fundamental bounds in sequential prediction and recursive algorithms, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of entropic analysis suggests a focus on information theory and entropy-based methods, which are also relevant to data science (cs.DS) and signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the study of achieving generic bounds from an innovations' viewpoint suggests a connection to control theory (cs.SY).
